com.example.codenameeh.classes

Class Book

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.codenameeh.classes.Book
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.os.Parcelable

    public class Book
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.os.Parcelable
    Requested, borrowed, accepted, denied by other users. Represents a real life book through representation of title, uuid, author, ISBN, decription, optional photograph, owner, keywords. Keeps track of who to is requesting this book, as well as if it's borrowed, accepted, confirmed to transact, etc. ownerConfirmation and borrowerConfirmation are used for the transaction of borrowing and returning

    • Nested Class Summary
